songName: Than Yaw Zin (သံယောဇဉ်)
about: A haunting rock song, weaving a tale of an intense bond between partners, where the shackles of past memories and repeated mistakes ensnare one in a maddening dance of struggle and stagnation
whenToListen: You are trying to forget everything and move forward, but your experiences and memories keep dragging you down.
lyrics:
(Verse 1)
Ma twayy chin lal pyan twayy nay mi
မတွေးချင်လည်း ပြန်တွေးနေမိ
Even though I don't want to think, I find myself thinking again

mae yin lal pyan thadi ya pee
မေ့ရင်လည်းပြန်သတိရပြီး
Even when I forget, I remember again.

O a hmat ma shi thay buu
အို အမှတ်မရှိသေးဘူး
Oh, I haven't learnt

ngar lwan soot
ငါ လွမ်းဆွတ်
I am yearning.

Ma phyit chin khae dar tway phyit kone b
မဖြစ်ချင်ခဲ့တာတွေ ဖြစ်ကုန်ပြီ
Things that I didn't want to happen have happened

hmar nay lal, ngar sat hmar pee
မှားနေလည်း ငါဆက်မှားပြီ
Even if I'm wrong, I continue to make mistakes.

dote kha myar kone b
ဒုက္ခများကုန်ပြီ
I have more sufferings now

har har
ဟာ ဟာ...

(Pre)
Yone htwat yinn nae sat sat nit khae
ရုန်းထွက်ရင်းနဲ့ ဆက်ဆက်နစ်ခဲ့
I kept falling while trying to escape

phyat tauk tine lal
ဖြတ်တောက်တိုင်းလည်း
Every time I tried to cut,

phyat pho khat tae, than yaw zin
ဖြတ်ဖို့ခက်တဲ့ သံယောဇဉ်
it's hard to cut our bonds

(Chorus)
than yaw zin
သံယောဇဉ်
Our bond

than yaw zin
သံယောဇဉ်
Our bond

ngar lay a pyat pyat nae thway htwat khae dal
ငါလေအပျက်ပျက်နဲ့သွေးထွက်ခဲ့တယ်
I bled miserably

than yaw zin
သံယောဇဉ်
Our bond

than yaw zin
သံယောဇဉ်
Our bond

lu ko a yuu ta bine phyit say tal
လူကိုအရူးတစ်ပိုင်း ဖြစ်စေတဲ့
It turns a person half crazy

than yaw zin
သံယောဇဉ်
Our bond

than yaw zin
သံယောဇဉ်
Our bond

nay myint lo yuu yint khae dal
နေမြင့်လို့အရူးရင့်ခဲ့တယ်
I wasn't that crazy because of the sun

d than yaw zin, d than yaw zin
ဒီသံယောဇဉ် ဒီသံယောဇဉ်
This bond, this bond

d than yaw zin, d than yaw zin
ဒီသံယောဇဉ် ဒီသံယောဇဉ်
This bond, this bond

Ohh, than yaw zin
အိုး သံယောဇဉ်
Ohh, our bond

(Verse 2)
Ma kyar chin lal, ngar kyar yaung mi
မကြားချင်လည်း ငါကြားယောင်မိ
Even though I don't want to hear, I keep hearing it

ma thwar chin lal, ngar sat thwar b
မသွားချင်လည်း ငါဆက်သွားပြီ
Even though I don't want to go, I keep going

a soe ma ya dae sate kyaunt, ngar khat b
အစိုးမရစိတ်တဲ့စိတ်ကြောင့် ငါ ခက်ပြီ
It's tough because of my restless mind

ma mhway thint bae ngar hmway dae mee
မမွှေးသင့်ပဲငါမွှေးတဲ့မီး
The fire that I light, though it should not have been lit

ma toe chin lal ngar sat toe pee
မတိုးချင်လည်း ငါဆက်တိုးပြီ
Even though I don't want to move forward, I keep moving forward

nga bawa kyuan laung b, ahhh..
ငါ့ဘဝကျွမ်းလောင်ပြီ အား..
My life is burning, ahhh..

(Pre)
Yone htwat yinn nae htet htet nit khae
ရုန်းထွက်ရင်းနဲ့ ထပ်ထပ်နစ်ခဲ့
I kept falling while trying to escape

phyat tauk tine lal
ဖြတ်တောက်တိုင်းလည်း
Every time I tried to cut,

ahhh, haa, haa
အား ဟား ဟား..

(Chorus)
than yaw zin
သံယောဇဉ်
Our bond

than yaw zin
သံယောဇဉ်
Our bond

ngar lay a pyat pyat nae thway htwat khae dal
ငါလေအပျက်ပျက်နဲ့သွေးထွက်ခဲ့တယ်
I bled miserably

than yaw zin
သံယောဇဉ်
Our bond

than yaw zin
သံယောဇဉ်
Our bond

lu ko a yuu ta bine phyit say tal
လူကိုအရူးတစ်ပိုင်း ဖြစ်စေတဲ့
It turns a person half crazy

than yaw zin
သံယောဇဉ်
Our bond

than yaw zin
သံယောဇဉ်
Our bond

nay myint lo yuu yint khae dal
နေမြင့်လို့အရူးရင့်ခဲ့တယ်
I wasn't that crazy because of the sun

(3x)
(d than yaw zin, d than yaw zin
ဒီသံယောဇဉ် ဒီသံယောဇဉ်
This bond, this bond

d than yaw zin, d than yaw zin
ဒီသံယောဇဉ် ဒီသံယောဇဉ်
This bond, this bond)

Ohh, than yaw zin
အိုး သံယောဇဉ်
Oh, our bond

meaning:
I keep thinking again although I don't want to
I remember again even if I forget
Oh, I haven’t forgotten yet
I miss you

The things I didn’t want to happen, happened
Even if I was wrong, I kept making mistakes
The sufferings are all over
Ha..ha...

I kept sinking in while struggling to get out, 
Every time I tried to cut, it was hard to cut these ties

Ties
Ties
I bled with airy hopelessness
Ties
Ties
The ties that make one partly crazy
Ties
Ties
I became mad due to the sun's heat
These ties, these ties
These ties, these ties
Oh...ties

Even if I don’t want to hear, I find myself pretending to hear
Even if I don’t want to go, I kept going
Due to the uncontrollable mind, I struggled
I lit the fire I shouldn’t have
Even if I don’t want to progress, I kept progressing
My life is burning....ah

I kept sinking in while struggling to get out, 
Every time I tried to cut, it was hard to cut
Ah...ha...ha...

Ties
Ties
I bled with airy hopelessness
Ties
Ties
The ties that make one partly crazy
Ties
Ties
I became mad due to the sun's heat
These ties, these ties
These ties, these ties
These ties, these ties
Oh...ties
